COTM.Name: Nazir Ahmed Sabbir
COTM.Details: Nazir Ahmed Sabbir is an awesome Contributor from Bangladesh. He is just a College student but passionate about Mozilla. His enthusiasm inspires us and rest of the Community to contribute more. He has done an awesome job in all Bug Days and Test Days. Hence, we are proud to say that, Sabbir is the Contributor of the Month for October, 2015. More about him can be read from here - http://blog.mozillabd.org/contributor-month-october
